Reston/Sterling, VA - AnyPresence (http://anypresence.com)

We're a small venture-backed enterprise mobile application startup. The founders' previous venture had a successful exit.

We're currently using Ruby, Rails, Coffeescript, Mongo, and a whole lot more. We're big fans of testing too. If you're in the DC area, interested in startups, and have some ruby experience we'd love to hear from you.

Email a little bit about yourself and your resume to jbozek@anypresence.com if you are interested.
